title.narrative: Renforcement de la capacité des associations féminines et des jeunes pour la promotion de la paix et le relèvement communautaire (RCAP).

description.narrative: Objectif global : La société civile, surtout les groupes vulnérables et souvent marginalisé, est renforcé de travailler avec des autorités locales et effectivement contribuer aux processus du relèvement et consolidation de la paix.Objectif spécifique: Les femmes et les jeunes sont plus capables dtre des participants actifs dans la promotion de la paix et la création de mécanismes communautaires inclusifs pour la résolution des conflits, et deviennent ainsi les champions de leur relèvement.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Central African Republic

description.narrative: Centre-Est de la RCA (Préfecture de la Ouaka)

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
